Action Cost: 1 [Combat] action Range: Touch Frequency: Once per short rest Effect: Touch a weapon or piece of armor. For 1 minute, choose one benefit: Weapons deal +[[/damage 1d8]] damage on next hit, OR Armor grants +1 DR. The infusion ends after triggering once or when duration expires. Violet light flows into the item like liquid energy, and it glows faintly while holding your magic.
